purpose: To provide a flexible framework for developing AI agents that can perform complex tasks involving reasoning, memory, and interaction with various technologies including blockchain.
principle: Built using Python, the framework leverages modern AI and ML libraries for reasoning and memory, while supporting multi-interface agent development.
reusability: Highly modular with support for plugins and APIs, allowing developers to extend functionality and integrate with various tools and platforms.
limitations: As an alpha release, it may have stability issues and incomplete documentation. Some features like deep research and MCP might be under development.
name: heurist-agent-framework
description: A flexible multi-interface AI agent framework for building agents with reasoning, tool use, memory, deep research, blockchain interaction, MCP, and agents-as-a-service.
highlight: A comprehensive framework for building versatile AI agents with capabilities like reasoning, memory, and blockchain interaction.
